page.title: 16PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: A favourite playground game which, like many others, involves running is called "Chainy". Somebody is "it" and they chase you. If they manage to "tig" you then you hold hands and chase the others. When you have four in one chain you halve it and make two chains. The game continues until everybody has been "tigged". A current favourite is called Run V T where someone gives the initials of a Television programme. The person that knows it has to run across the playground and say the name of the programme. As well as these games many other children are playing with balls, footballs, skipping ropes, and other toys brought from home.
